Source code for maxaibase.model.H2O.h2o_unsupervised

from maxaibase.model.H2O.h2o_base import H2OBaseModel
from abc import ABC, abstractmethod

from pysparkling.ml import H2OGridSearch

from pyspark.ml import Pipeline, PipelineModel



[docs]class H2OUnsupervisedBaseModel(H2OBaseModel):
    """
    used for unsupervised models
    Args:
        model: model which we will use
        data(spark dataframe): data on which we have to run the model
    """
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.model = None
        self.data = None


[docs]    @abstractmethod
    def build(self):
        raise NotImplementedError()



[docs]    def get_model(self):
        if isinstance(self.model, PipelineModel):
            return self.model.stages[0]
        else:
            return self.model

    

[docs]    def get_params(self):
        """
        gets the params
        returns:
            parameters and parameter grid
        """
        return {"params": self.params, "param_grid": self.param_grid}



[docs]    def optimise_model(self):
        """
        optimises model by using H2O Grid Search
        """
        # initialize H2O Grid search
        grid = H2OGridSearch()\
                .setHyperParameters(self.param_grid)\
                .setAlgo(self.model)\
                .setStrategy("Cartesian")
        pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[grid])
        self.model = pipeline.fit(self.data)



[docs]    def fit(self, data):
        """
        fits the model to the data and calls optimise_model function
        """
        self.data = data
        self.optimise_model()



[docs]    def predict(self, data):
        """
        makes prediction on the data 
        Returns:
            data with prediction column
        """
        # Making predictions
        if not self.model:
            raise Exception("load model before calling predict")
        data = self.model.transform(data)
        return data

    

[docs]    def best_params(self):
        pass



[docs]    def get_model_diagnostics(self):
        # spark classification metrics
        pass
